55 // TODO: Implement
56 enum class ComponentFlag {
57  kIsScene = 1 << 0, // If true, this is a scene component, not a scene object component
58  kIsEnabled = 1 << 1, // If true, component is enabled
59  kLocked = 1 << 2 // If locked, component cannot be modified by the user
60 };

120  bool isEnabled() const {
121  return m_componentFlags.testFlag(SceneBehaviorFlag::kEnabled);
122  }
123

143  inline bool isScriptGenerated() const {
144  return m_componentFlags.testFlag(SceneBehaviorFlag::kScriptGenerated);
145  }

147  m_componentFlags.setFlag(SceneBehaviorFlag::kScriptGenerated, val);
148  }

154 
156  ParentType parentType() const {
157  if (sceneObject())
158  return kSceneObject;
159  else
160  return kScene;
